USB.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a system used to connect equipment such as a mouse or printer to a computer using wires so that all the equipment can work together
USB.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Many USB devices come with their own built-in cable.
USB.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a part of a computer to which you can connect other equipment, for example a printer
USB.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: You can plug your camera into the USB port and move images onto your computer for viewing, printing and editing.
